title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 308 - Employer Compliance, Enforcement, Record And Report Requirements And Stop-work Orders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 308 - Employer Compliance, Enforcement, Record And Report Requirements And Stop-work Orders

State Regulations
§ 308.1 - Definitions
§ 308.2 - Calculating cost of compensation
§ 308.3 - Record requirements for employers
§ 308.4 - Periodic reports as condition of release from a stop-work order
§ 308.5 - Redetermination review of a stop-work order

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 308

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 2[22], 131, 141- a, 117[1], L. 2007, ch. 6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
